title: Question about friend list (new client)
body:
So when Im looking at a ppl's in my friend (firend, lul) list I can see what champion is he playing actually and which skin is he using. Smth like this - http://i66.tinypic.com/fuz0oj.png[/IMG]
(Sorry for my weak censore skills, im just into paint dxx)
But when it comes to my preview, it doesnt show a skin. Can i set up this in any way? :v

replies.body: This preview is your most recently played champions!   The previews you see should be the same splash you find on their profile.  While your preview might now show up while mousing over yourself, it is on your profile page.  If you have any feedback, though, let our client devs know through our[ client discussion](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) boards!  The updated version is still in testing so anything can help.  Let me know if that clears things up!
